h1_title: Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You
h3_title: 7\. Not All Items Are What They Appear to Be
content: Sometimes, when you’re gathering a mushroom or plucking a flower from the ground you’ll also find an enemy attached to it. So be prepared that sometimes when you’re foraging, you’ll also need to take down an enemy that emerges from the ground if you really want the item.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Things_Black_Myth_Wukong_Doesn't_Tell_You.md', within the main section titled 'Things Black Myth Wukong Doesn't Tell You', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection '7\. Not All Items Are What They Appear to Be'.
The content is as follows:
Sometimes, when you’re gathering a mushroom or plucking a flower from the ground you’ll also find an enemy attached to it. So be prepared that sometimes when you’re foraging, you’ll also need to take down an enemy that emerges from the ground if you really want the item.
